channel.title: centos7 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in centos7 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: VirtualBox
item.description: centos7.8 虚拟机 查看自己的内核 这个是可以安装的 内核版本 小版本也要对应 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 [root@localhost sdb]# rpm -qa |grep kernel kernel-3.10.0-1127.el7.x86_64 kernel-tools-libs-3.10.0-1127.el7.x86_64 kernel-headers-3.10.0-1127.19.1.el7.x86_64 kernel-devel-3.10.0-1127.19.1.el7.x86_64 kernel-devel-3.10.0-1127.el7.x86_64 abrt-addon-kerneloops-2.1.11-57.el7.centos.x86_64 kernel-tools-3.10.0-1127.el7.x86_64 添加VirtualBox安装源 1 2 3 cd /etc/yum.repos.d/ yum install wget wget http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/rpm/rhel/virtualbox.repo 安装 1 2 yum update yum install binutils qt gcc make patch libgomp glibc-headers glibc-devel kernel-headers kernel-devel dkms 记得对应版本安装 kernel 版本下表 1 2 3 4 5 kernel-3.
